Title: Doped
Plot: A deadly drunk-driving car accident brings Detectives Cyrus Lupo and Kevin Bernard to the scene when a suspicious nasal spray is found. After the medical examiner realizes the nasal spray is a powerful anesthetic that could easily disorient its user, the detectives become suspicious of the victim's boss, Zach Marshall
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
